summary: Email exchange between FBI personnel regarding the placement of a 'Silent Hit' record for international travel notification on two individuals, active from August 29, 2019, to August 29, 2020. The communication confirms the records are inbound and that both subjects appear to still be in the country.

persons.name: SSA FBI New York
persons.context: Appears to be the recipient and sender of emails regarding the 'Silent Hit' record for international travel notification.

events.title: Silent Hit Record Activation
events.description: A 'Silent Hit' record for international travel is activated to notify the FBI of any travel by two individuals, effective from August 29, 2019, to August 29, 2020.

keyFacts: A 'Silent Hit' record was placed on two individuals for international travel notification on August 29, 2019.
The record was active from August 29, 2019, to August 29, 2020.
The FBI confirmed that both individuals associated with the record appeared to still be in the country as of the email date.
The communication indicates ongoing FBI monitoring or investigation of these individuals' travel movements.
